original_text: And Saul and the men of Israel were gathered together, and pitched by the valley of Elah, and set the battle in array against the Philistines.
korean_text: 사울과 이스라엘 사람들이 모여서 엘라 골짜기에 진 치고 블레셋 사람들을 대하여 전열을 벌였으니

sentences.original_text: And Saul and the men of Israel
and pitched by the valley of Elah
and set the battle in array against the Philistines
